meanings.definition: An arrangement to meet someone at a particular time and place.
meanings.sent1: My dentist appointments are always on Tuesdays at 2 pm.
meanings.sent2: She scheduled her hair appointment for next Friday.
meanings.sent3: The cat made appointments with the birds to meet at the park.
meanings.sent4: His appointments with destiny were always unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The word 'appointments' brings to mind punctuality and planning.

meanings.definition: The act of assigning a job or role to someone.
meanings.sent1: The manager's appointments included delegating tasks to the team.
meanings.sent2: The appointments of duties were clear within the organization.
meanings.sent3: The teddy bear's appointments were to guard the toy chest.
meanings.sent4: Her appointments of trust were never taken lightly.
meanings.sent5: Appointments in this sense involve giving out responsibilities.

meanings.definition: A job or position of responsibility.
meanings.sent1: His new appointment as team leader came with added responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: She was proud of her appointment as class president.
meanings.sent3: The dog's appointment as chief squirrel chaser was a serious role.
meanings.sent4: The appointment of guardian was a weighty decision.
meanings.sent5: An appointment can signify a significant role in an organization.
